Text: RE Risk AustraliaVince Ill give him a try Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday May PM To Subject RE Risk Australia Philip Please try Frank Wolak from Stanford University He is the best expert on California right now Vince Original Message From philip annesley ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESphilipannesleyCpannesleyriskwatersEcom E NRONcom Sent Wednesday May PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject RE Risk Australia Vince Thanks for coming back to me on this anyway Would you be able to suggest anyone else either in Australia Europe or US who would be good to get to discuss the California crisis kind regards Philip Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday May AM To Cc Subject RE Risk Australia Philip I have to decline the invitation with regrets I have too many commitments right now Vince Kaminski Original Message From philip annesley ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESphilipannesleyCpannesleyriskwatersEcom E NRONcom Sent Monday May AM To Subject Risk Australia Dear Vince Just a quick message to follow up on the email that I sent you recently inviting you to speak at our forthcoming congress Risk Australia which is taking place in Sydney on August Have you had an opportunity to consider the invitation yet We are aiming to have the programme printed next week so I would really need to know as soon as possible if you would be available to speak at this years congress I am working from our Hong Kong office for this week only Tel and I can be contacted by phone there or by email Kind regards Philip Philip Annesley Conference Producer Risk Waters Group wwwriskconferencescomriskaus

RE Risk AustraliaThanks for coming back to me on this anyway Would you be able to suggest anyone else either in Australia Europe or US who would be good to get to discuss the California crisis kind regards Philip Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday May AM To Cc Subject RE Risk Australia Philip I have to decline the invitation with regrets I have too many commitments right now Vince Kaminski Original Message From philip annesley ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESphilipannesleyCpannesleyriskwatersEcom E NRONcom Sent Monday May AM To Subject Risk Australia Dear Vince Just a quick message to follow up on the email that I sent you recently inviting you to speak at our forthcoming congress Risk Australia which is taking place in Sydney on August Have you had an opportunity to consider the invitation yet We are aiming to have the programme printed next week so I would really need to know as soon as possible if you would be available to speak at this years congress I am working from our Hong Kong office for this week only Tel and I can be contacted by phone there or by email Kind regards Philip Philip Annesley Conference Producer Risk Waters Group wwwriskconferencescomriskaus

Risk AustraliaVince I am currently producing Risk Australia Risk and EPRM magazines annual Australian derivatives and risk management congress which is taking place in Sydney on August I understand that you spoke at our Australian Energy Risk conference last year I have now put together the draft programme and I am at the stage of inviting people to speak at the event in August I would like to invite you to speak at this years congress and I attach a copy of the draft programme I particularly had in mind the presentation Case study learning the lessons of the Californian electricity crisis could it happen here talk number in stream three of the programme which focuses on pricing trading and risk management in the Australian energy markets However if there is another topic that you would be more interested in presenting then please let me know This years event combines last years Australian Energy Risk and Risk conferences to create Australias most comprehensive risk management and derivatives congress This year the congress will also include two oneday post conference seminars on August Should you require any further information about the programme or the event generally please dont hesitate to contact me either by telephone on or by email at I very much hope that you will be able to accept this invitation and I look forward to hearing from you Kind regards Philip Annesley Conference Producer Risk Waters Group Tel Fax Risk USA Boston June Risk magazines th annual US derivatives and risk management congress For a full program and the latest information visit wwwriskconferencescomriskusa RISK AUSTRALIA draft programmedoc
